member.name: F:BaGetter.Database.MySql.MySqlContext.UniqueConstraintViolationErrorCode
member.summary: The MySQL Server error code for when a unique constraint is violated.

member.name: P:BaGetter.Database.MySql.MySqlContext.SupportsLimitInSubqueries
member.summary: MySQL does not support LIMIT clauses in subqueries for certain subquery operators. See: https://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/8.0/en/subquery-restrictions.html
